input.sentences: this father is working on his car .
the kids are in the house sitting around talking .
they decide to play the wii | it is a really fun game .
the little sister is making her rounds .
later that night there will be fireworks .
output.sentences: The father was outside washing the car.
Inside the kids were sitting around the table talking.
One of the boys was playing on his Wii.
The little sister was making her rounds with pictures she had drawn.
At the end of the day, the family went outside and shot fireworks.
